Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    Contain the array of BankAccount objects. Contains method to interact with the bank accounts.
    Since:
    1.8.0_144
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Minh Duc Pham
    See Also:
    Scanner

      Default Constructor.

      Parameterized Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAccount()
      Method prompts user to enter data used to add a new account if there is room.
      java.lang.String displayAccount()
      Prompts user to enter account number to display.
      int findAccount()
      Prompts users to enter which account number they wish to find
      void monthlyUpdate()
      Process through each current account in the array and updates the balance apporiately
      void printAccountDetails()
      Prints detail of all account
      void updateAccount()
      Prompts user enter which account number to update and by how much.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bank

        public Bank()
        Default Constructor. Allocate default size of 1000

      • Bank

        public Bank(int mSize)
        Parameterized Constructor
        Parameters:
        mSize - The maximum amount of bank accounts the system can hold.

    • Method Detail

      • addAccount

        public boolean addAccount()
        Method prompts user to enter data used to add a new account if there is room.
        Returns:
        false if no account is created

      • displayAccount

        public java.lang.String displayAccount()
        Prompts user to enter account number to display. Return data of the account or put an error message
        Returns:
        the information of the account user want to display

      • printAccountDetails

        public void printAccountDetails()
        Prints detail of all account

      • updateAccount

        public void updateAccount()
        Prompts user enter which account number to update and by how much. Updates the balance and return success/error message

      • findAccount

        public int findAccount()
        Prompts users to enter which account number they wish to find
        Returns:
        array index if the needed account is found

      • monthlyUpdate

        public void monthlyUpdate()
        Process through each current account in the array and updates the balance apporiately
